hero.title: Convert YouTube Videos to MP3
hero.subtitle: The fastest way to convert YouTube videos to high-quality MP3 files. Simple, free, and no registration required.

feature1.title: Fast Conversion
feature1.description: Convert any YouTube video to MP3 in seconds, without waiting in queues.

feature2.title: High Quality Audio
feature2.description: Get the best audio quality possible from your YouTube videos.

feature3.title: No Registration
feature3.description: No account required. Just paste your YouTube URL and download.

feature4.title: Free to Use
feature4.description: Our service is completely free with no hidden costs or limitations.

feature5.title: Multiple Languages
feature5.description: Our interface is available in multiple languages for your convenience.

feature6.title: Secure Process
feature6.description: Your data is never stored on our servers. All conversions are private and secure.

step1.title: Paste YouTube URL
step1.description: Copy the URL of any YouTube video and paste it into the converter box.

step2.title: Convert to MP3
step2.description: Click the convert button and wait a few seconds for the process to complete.

step3.title: Download Your MP3
step3.description: Once conversion is complete, download your MP3 file with one click.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, our YouTube to MP3 converter is 100% free to use with no limitations.
faq.q2: What is the maximum length of video I can convert?
faq.a2: You can convert YouTube videos of any length, but longer videos may take more time to process.
faq.q3: What audio quality will I get?
faq.a3: We extract the highest quality audio available from the YouTube video, typically 128-192 kbps.
faq.q4: Is it legal to convert YouTube videos to MP3?
faq.a4: Converting YouTube videos for personal use is generally accepted. However, redistributing copyrighted content is not permitted.
faq.q5: Do you store the converted files on your server?
faq.a5: No, we don't store any converted files. Files are deleted immediately after download.
faq.q6: Can I use this on mobile devices?
faq.a6: Yes, our converter works on all devices including smartphones and tablets.
